keyMoments.title: Kokujo O Tatsumaki Debut
keyMoments.description: Zoro demonstrates his enhanced post-timeskip technique, Kokujo O Tatsumaki (Black Rope Great Dragon Twister), creating a massive dragon-like tornado that devastates multiple New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: First major showcase of Zoro's enhanced power after two years of training with Mihawk. Demonstrates his ability to create large-scale devastating attacks.
keyMoments.quote: This whirlwind will not cease until its targets are sent to hell.

keyMoments.title: 108 Pound Cannon Usage
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses the 108 Pound Cannon technique to send powerful compressed air slashes through enemy ranks.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the versatility of Zoro's post-timeskip arsenal.

keyMoments.title: Training with Mihawk Flashback
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals Zoro's intense two-year training period on Kuraigana Island with Dracule Mihawk.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for Zoro's dramatic power increase and new techniques.

abilities.description: A powerful enhanced version of Tatsu Maki. Zoro spins to create a dragon-like tornado that both slashes and blows away targets. The whirlwind continues like an actual tornado and cuts up anyone caught in it. Named after Kalasutra, one of the eight levels of hot Naraka (hell) in Buddhism.
Zoro sends powerful compressed air slashes at his opponents.

reveals.information: Mastered enhanced versions of his sword techniques after training with Mihawk

keyMoments.title: Sky Walk Debut
keyMoments.description: Sanji demonstrates his new ability to walk on air - Sky Walk - when surrounded by the Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad. He effortlessly leaps into the air and remains airborne.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Sanji's Sky Walk ability, fundamentally changing his fighting style with aerial mobility. Similar to CP9's Moon Walk but developed independently.

keyMoments.title: Poêle à Frire: Spectre Debut
keyMoments.description: From his airborne position, Sanji activates Diable Jambe and performs Poêle à Frire: Spectre, rapidly kicking downward with his flaming leg to strike multiple opponents.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Sanji's enhanced Diable Jambe techniques and tactical thinking in combining Sky Walk with aerial attacks.

keyMoments.title: Momoiro Island Training Flashback
keyMoments.description: Extended flashback shows Sanji's two-year training on Momoiro Island, constantly fleeing from Okama inhabitants which built tremendous leg strength and eventually granted him Sky Walk ability.
keyMoments.significance: Provides context for Sanji's enhanced abilities and leg strength. Shows how adversity led to significant power gains.

abilities.description: Sanji can walk on air by kicking off the air itself, similar to CP9's Moon Walk (Geppo) but developed independently through intense leg strength training on Momoiro Island.
While airborne using Sky Walk, Sanji activates Diable Jambe and rapidly kicks downward with his flaming leg, striking multiple opponents simultaneously.

reveals.information: Gained Sky Walk ability and enhanced Diable Jambe techniques from training on Momoiro Island

keyMoments.title: Jean Noueilles Debut
keyMoments.description: Jean Noueilles, a porcupinefish fish-man and commander of the Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad, makes his first appearance and attempts to attack Sanji.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a specialized unit commander within the New Fish-Man Pirates.

affiliations.role: Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad Commander

relationships.description: Jean Noueilles serves under Hody Jones as a commander in the New Fish-Man Pirates.

reveals.information: Porcupinefish fish-man and commander of the Sea Urchin Armor Spine Squad

keyMoments.title: Zeo Rallies the Troops
keyMoments.description: Zeo prevents the New Fish-Man Pirates from retreating after Luffy's Haki display, rallying them by reframing their loss of 50,000 soldiers as still having 50,000 remaining.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zeo's role as strategist and morale officer, showing his leadership and persuasive abilities.
keyMoments.quote: If they run away, they deserve death. Even though we have lost 50,000, we are still 50,000 strong!

reveals.information: Acts as morale officer and strategist for the New Fish-Man Pirates

keyMoments.title: Leads Straw Hats in Assault
keyMoments.description: Following his knockout of 50,000 enemies with Conqueror's Haki, Luffy leads the Straw Hats in their coordinated assault against the New Fish-Man Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's leadership and confidence in his crew's abilities.
keyMoments.quote: Stay still. We'll defeat all of you soon enough.
